remarks: A subspace is in the domain of the projection function iff the subspace admits a projection decomposition of the whole space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
pjdm2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
pjdm2.l $e |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
pjdm2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
pjdm2.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
pjdm2.k $e |- K = ( proj ` W ) $.
pjdm2 $p |- ( W e. PreHil -> ( T e. dom K <-> ( T e. L /\ ( T .(+) ( ._|_ ` T ) ) = V ) ) ) $.
